sections.text: aerial vehicles: Weaponization prohibited; penalties.

sections.heading: Unmanned
sections.text:
aerial vehicles: Operation near critical facility or within 5 miles of airport

prohibited; exceptions; penalty.

sections.heading: Unmanned
sections.text:
aerial vehicles: Operation by law enforcement agency; warrant required under

certain circumstances; information acquired in violation of section inadmissible

and may not be used to establish reasonable suspicion or probable cause.

[Effective through December 31, 2024.]

sections.heading: Unmanned
sections.text:
aerial vehicles: Operation by public agency; requirements; prohibited uses;

information acquired in violation of section inadmissible and may not be used

to establish reasonable suspicion or probable cause. [Effective through

December 31, 2024.]

sections.heading: Unmanned
sections.text:
aerial vehicles: Department of Public Safety required to establish and maintain

registry of such vehicles operated by public agencies; public agencies required

to submit certain information for inclusion in registry; annual reports to

Legislature; regulations; establishment by Department of certain lists.

[Effective through December 31, 2024.]
